body:
Hi Olivier, There is a boolean that indicates if you want the results to be compressed. Make sure you have _writeCompression_ in controlDict component set to False. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/kb2cz-EWmHuWF9eFfG36PKsIyLN9RI47crADbECQeLpsPYpduI5k7ejIZAi-jtd6Oh-CwunCil7OMzSABMSynSmdqoU-UDNy/compressResults.png)
Mostapha
